Translations.Text: Alif,	Laam,	Miiym,	(Insiguro	y’izi	ndome	hamwe	nuwufise	ubumenyi bwazo bwose n’Imana yonyene gusa)
Abarumi batsinzwe
Mugisagara kiri hafi yabo bamaze gutsindwa, mugabo bazotsinda
Mumyaka mikeyi gusa itegeko ni ry’Imana yonyene imbere n’inyuma, y’uwo musi aba Isilamu bazonezerwa
K’uburokoke bw’Imana irokora uwo yishakiye, nayo niyo ifise ubushobozi bukwiye n’impuhwe zihagije
Indagano y’Imana n’indagano Imana idatabwa mugabo abantu benshi ntavyo bazi
Barafise ubumenyi buboneka bujanye n’ubuzima bwo ng’aha kw’isi, mugabo bakihenda n’ubuzima bwo mw’ijuru budahera
Mbega ntibiyumvira mumitima yabo yuko Imana itaremye Amajuru n’Isi hamwe n’ibirimwo vyose yuko ari ivy’ukuri, no kugihe cagenywe mu vy’ukuri abantu benshi ntibavyemera yuko bazohura n’Umuremyi wabo

Mbega ntibagenda genda kuri iy’Isi turiko nukuraba ukugene yabaye amaherezo y’aba bantu bamyeho imbere yabo, nabo bari bafise ubushobozi buhanitse kubasumba, bakaba barima kuri iy’Isi nuku yiringaniza neza kubasumba uko bahora bayi ringaniza, n’intumwa zabo z’Imana zarabashikiye zifise ibimenyetso biri k’umugaragaro, rero Imana ntiyari kubahemukira, mugabo nibo bonyene bahemukiye imitima yabo
Hanyuma impera yabagize amabi yose nuguhakana amajambo y’Imana matagatifu nukuyatyoza
Imana rugira vyose niyo yatanguje kurema ibiremwa vyose, kandi niyo izobigarura hanyuma bize bisubizwe iwe
N’umusi umuhero w’Isi uzoshika, inkozi z’ibibi zose zizo debukirwa
Ntibazoba bafise uwubasabira mubo bahora bagereranyako	n’ibindi bintu, nabo bagereranywako n’ibindi bintu bazoba hakana icese
N’umusi	w’umuhero	w’Isi	uzoboneka	kuri	uwo	musi	abantu bazocanamwo
Nayo	abemeye	Imana	yabo	y’ukuri	nukugira	ibikorwa	vyiza, bazonezerezwa nabo bari mumirima iteye igomwe iri mw’ijuru
Nayo abahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri, nuguhakana amajambo yacu hamwe n’ihuriro ry’umusi w’imperuka abo bantu bazoshengezwa n’ibihano vyo mumuriro udahera
Rero nimuyihayagize Imana mugihe c’ijoro hamwe no mugihe co mugitondo
Nihayagizwa ryose ryiza niry’Imana haba mumajuru canke kw’Isi n’igihe co k’umuhingamo hamwe n’igihe co kumurango
Niyo ikura igifise ubuzima mukintu capfuye, nugukura ikintu capfuye mukintu gifise ubuzima, kandi niyo igira Isi kuba ari toto mugihe yari yarapfuye, rero uko niko muzozurwa
No mubimenyetso vyayo nuku kubarema ibakuye mw’ivu hanyuma nukuba abantu bakwiye

No mubimenyetso vyayo nuko yabaremeye abapfasoni banyu nkuko namwe mwaremwe kugira ngo muronke ihumurizo kuribo, nayo yabagiriye urukundo n’ikigongwe hagati yanyu, ntankeka muri ibi vyose harimwo ibimenyetso ku bantu biyumvira
No mubimenyetso vyayo nukurema Amajuru n’Isi hamwe nugutahuza indimi zanyu n’amabara yanyu, mu vy’ukuri muri ibi vyose harimwo ibimenyetso ku bantu bafise ubumenyi buhagije

No mubimenyetso vyayo nukubereka imiravyo nukubatera ubwoba n’igihababu nukumanura amazi avuye mubicu, kuriyo igaca izura Isi yari yarapfuye, ntankeka muri ibi vyose harimwo ibimenyetso ku bantu bategera neza
No mubimenyetso vyayo nuko Ijuru n’Isi bihagaze kw’itegeko ryayo, hanyuma mugihe izoba hamagara ihamagaro rimwe gusa mwese muzozuka mukuzimu
Ibiri mumajuru no kw’Isi yose ni vy’Imana, kandi vyose nibi gamburukira Imana

Nayo niyo yatanguje ibiremwa vyose ikaba nayo ariyo izobigarura bikaba kuriyo ari ibintu vyoroshe cane kuriyo, nayo niyo ifise ihayagizwa ryiza riri mw’Ijuru no kw’Isi nayo niyo nyene ububasha n’ubuhizi buhagije

Yarabatangiye ko akarorero kubijanye n’imitima yanyu, mbega mubo mwitungiye n’amaboko yanyu y’iburyo harimwo abo mucuditse nabo muvyo twabahaye kugeza naho mungana nukubatinya nkuko mwitinyana kubwanyu, uku rero niko dutandukanya aya majambo yacu ku bantu bategera
Mugabo abahemukiye imitima yabo nuko bakurikiye amatamariro y’imitima yabo nabo batabizi, none ni nde ashobora kurongora uwo Imana yataye mubuzimire, nabo ntibazoba bafise abazoba rokora
Rero nutumbereze amaso yawe kw’idini ry’ukuri, kuko ariryo rema Imana yabaremeye abantu, rero ntahindagurika mwirema ry’ibiremwa vy’Imana, iryo niryo dini ry’ukuri mugabo abantu benshi ntavyo bazi
